name: @jcu/web-framework
description: The web UI framework for building responsive, mobile-first web projects with University styling
author: JCU eResearch Centre

scripts.css: npm-run-all css-deps css-compile css-prefix css-minify css-copy
scripts.css-deps: cross-env-shell shx cp -r node_modules/typeface-open-sans/files dist/fonts/open-sans && cross-env-shell shx cp -r node_modules/typeface-playfair-display/files dist/fonts/playfair-display && cross-env-shell shx cp -r node_modules/@mdi/font/fonts dist/fonts/mdi
scripts.css-copy: cross-env-shell shx mkdir -p site/docs/$npm_package_version_short/dist/ && cross-env-shell shx cp -r dist/css/ dist/fonts/ site/docs/$npm_package_version_short/dist/
scripts.css-main: npm-run-all css-lint css-compile-main css-prefix-main css-minify-main css-copy
scripts.css-compile-main: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/scss/jcu-web-framework.scss dist/css/jcu-web-framework.css && npm run css-copy
scripts.css-compile-fonts: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/scss/fonts.scss dist/css/fonts.css && replace --silent './files/(open-sans)' '../fonts/$1/$1' dist/css/fonts.css && replace --silent './files/(playfair-display)' '../fonts/$1/$1' dist/css/fonts.css
scripts.css-compile-mdi: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/scss/materialdesignicons.scss dist/css/materialdesignicons.css
scripts.img-optimise: cross-env-shell shx cp -r src/img dist/ && find dist/img -type d -exec imagemin {}/* --out-dir={} \;
scripts.img-copy: cross-env-shell shx mkdir -p site/docs/$npm_package_version_short/dist/ && cross-env-shell shx cp -r dist/img/ site/docs/$npm_package_version_short/dist/
scripts.js-deps: cross-env-shell shx cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.* node_modules/popper.js/dist/umd/popper.min* node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/* dist/js/
scripts.js-copy: cross-env-shell shx mkdir -p site/docs/$npm_package_version_short/dist/ && cross-env-shell shx cp -r dist/js/ site/docs/$npm_package_version_short/dist/
scripts.docs-deps-js: cross-env-shell shx mkdir -p site/docs/$npm_package_version_short/assets/js/ && cross-env-shell shx cp node_modules/@khanacademy/tota11y/dist/tota11y.min.js site/docs/$npm_package_version_short/dist/js/
scripts.watch-js: nodemon --watch node_modules/jquery/dist --watch node_modules/popper.js/dist/umd --watch node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js --ext js --exec "npm run js"
